com.vector.cfg.workflow.groovy.update

Interface IUpdateApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IInputFilesEntryPoint

    @PublishedApi(value=ADDITIONS_ALLOWED)
 @PublishedApiDomain(value=AUTOMATION_IF)
public interface IUpdateApi
extends IInputFilesEntryPoint
    The Interface IUpdateApi. *

    IUpdateApi

    The IUpdateApi is the automation interface for the modification of update workflows. 

    

 scriptTask("DelegateApproach", APPLICATION) {
     code {
         workflow {
             update(Paths.get("MyProject.dpa"),  {
                 ...
             })
         }
     }
 }

    (c) Copyright Vctr Informatik GmbH. All Rights Reserved.
